attributes.action: Make Religious Discrimination Online A Criminal Offence.
attributes.background: I would action to be taken against those who hide behind their computer screens and discriminate upon others and be allowed to get away with it.

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. There's a general principle that actions that are illegal offline are also illegal online. 

You can find out more here:

https://www.cps.gov.uk/legal-guidance/social-media-guidelines-prosecuting-cases-involving-communications-sent-social-media

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
